# CI/CD Documentation

This directory contains documentation for CI/CD setup and configuration.

## Files

- **GITHUB_SECRETS_SETUP.md** - Complete guide for configuring GitHub Secrets (SONAR_TOKEN, NVD_API_KEY)
- **MIGRATION_GUIDE.md** - Guide for migrating repository from `diegorighi` to `va-nessa-mudanca` organization

## Quick Links

- [Configure GitHub Secrets](./GITHUB_SECRETS_SETUP.md)
- [Migration Guide](./MIGRATION_GUIDE.md)
- [SonarCloud Setup](../setup/SONARCLOUD_ORG_SETUP.md)
- [OWASP Setup](../../docs/setup/OWASP_SETUP.md)
